phrases: Episode 5
*Decisions
*This program delayed 25 minutes due to the extended baseball game.
*Good luck, Yoshida-san
*Friends
What am I supposed to do?
Sawako?
Sawako.
Sawako!
What is wrong?
You are spilling your rice.
Are you all right?
I-It is nothing.
I was just thinking about my exams.
I see...
They start tomorrow, huh?
Yeah.
I am done eating.
Already?
Yeah.
What am I supposed to do tomorrow,
when I meet Yano-san, Yoshida-san and Kazehaya-kun?
Oh yeah,
we have got exams now.
Everyone is sitting in attendance order.
Who is in my usual seat?
Yano-san.
She is not avoiding my seat.
After all the rumors that went around because of me.
Those three never avoided me.
They were never afraid of me.
They have always been nice to me.
'Morning.
Oh yeah, you are in Sadako's seat.
Sadako.
Normally she greets everyone even if it creeps them out.
She just went straight to her seat.
She did not even look at us.
Why?
I do not know.
But she is not being herself.
Being here in this different seat,
I feel like that other arrangement was never there to begin with.
Like it has never been that way.
It feels distant, like it was all a dream.
Begin.
I really wanted to be useful, not a nuisance.
But I still have not fixed the misunderstandings about Yano-san and Yoshida-san.
Even if I find the people spreading the rumors and make them stop,
if I stay here, I am going to end up hurting them again.
Such kind people.
I may be able to stop the rumors,
but I do not know how to make them feel better.
So I am going to go back to what it was like,
before I got used to being around them.
That has to be the best thing to do.
I wonder if Yoshida-san used those notes.
I hope they were at least a bit helpful.
Yano-san, I can tell a scary story now.
I wanted you to be the first to hear it,
but I guess that will not happen anymore.
Kazehaya-kun, I...
I was so happy whenever you were around.
I have always longed for you.
I have always looked up to you.
I do not know how I used to live with being alone.
I have already discovered what it feels like to be kind, to receive kindness.
I do not know how to go back.
I do not know.
How did I bear being alone?
How did I never lose my mind?
I have forgotten it all.
All of it.
The first day of summer,
Kazehaya-kun was here waiting just the same.
I still do not get it.
If you do not hate me, why are you avoiding me?
Do not talk to me.
I cannot say it.
I cannot say what I do not even understand myself.
What?
I am sorry if I ruined your reputation.
Wait.
Kuronuma!
Speak properly so that I can understand you.
I am going to ruin your reputation if I stay around you.
Reputation?
Who said that?
There are rumors.
Rumors?
Reputations, rumors...
What about how I feel?
That is not something for you to decide.
That is for me to decide.
I will do what I want.
If I want to talk to you, I will.
If I did not want to, I would not be talking to you now.
I do not care about rumors.
The only Kuronuma I know is the one that I see.
I have always wanted this.
People like Yano-san, Yoshida-san and Kazehaya-kun.
I have always wanted
to care for people and to be cared for.
Feeling better?
Thanks.
I was thirsty.
Thanks.
I will keep this, then.
I was feeling so hopeless until just now.
It is weird.
Whenever Kazehaya-kun laughs, I feel at ease.
As if my heart becomes untangled.
The only Kuronuma I know is the one that I see.
I was so happy.
I felt like I was being told that I could be here.
I was so happy.
I see.
So you were being awkward because of the rumors about Yano and Yoshida.
What if it were the other way around?
If Yano or I avoided you thinking we would ruin your reputation.
No way.
I would want to stay together.
That might be how they are feeling.
So it is all about how the other person feels.
I do not know how they feel,
but they might get worried.
I know I was worried.
I-I-I am sorry.
No.
No way.
Never again.
People have refused to let me come near,
but I do not think anyone's ever refused to let me avoid them.
I guess I have been thinking about it all in my head.
But I would not know unless I asked.
No, they would not know unless I told them.
I want to tell them.
I want Yano-san and Yoshida-san to listen to me.
To my feelings.
You already have someone you can talk to.
I am going to try talking to Yoshida-san and Yano-san.
Not just as classmates,
but as friends.
No, I am going to try my best to be their friend.
I said it.
Yeah.
Go for it.
His simple words, his smiles... they always nudge me forward.
Go for it, Kuronuma.
Go for it.
Kazehaya-kun, I am going to do it.
I am going for it.
Trust me.
What is up with you?
Go home and start studying or something.
I was about to go to the library to study.
You are more hard-working than you look.
It is all your fault!
If you had not shown up back then
What the hell are you talking about?
What if I had not show up?
If he had not show up...
I would have heard what Sadako was saying.
Nothing.
Hey you, do not go blaming me.
Whatever it is you are talking about,
you are not going to get anywhere until you stop blaming other people.
You are going to run into a lot of awful situations in your life.
In the end, it is up to you to do something about it.
It is up to you.
Even if it is my fault!
You figure it out yourself.
Speaking of which, you better have given those print-outs to Ryu.
I burned them!
You did what?!
Do not go blaming me.
What was that about?
He is the last person I want to hear that from.
This is the book Sadako was reading.
It is.
This one too.
Why all Japanese horror stories?
She is so weird.
You might as well take advantage of that appearance.
I was just kidding.
What an eager student.
Someone is upset.
Want me to cheer you up?
Forget it.
I am not upset.
Ever since you were a kid you would because trouble and get kicked out
and then you would sit out here all upset.
Shut up.
What, did you run here?
Yeah, Pin's practice menu.
You are not upset about the rumors about you being a delinquent, are you?
Those rumors are no match for my thick skin.
I figured.
I am not too smart.
I do not know anymore!
Is Sadako really Sadako or is she Dark-Sadako?
You are right, I do not know either.
So it is like,
those rumors.
They said it was Sadako spreading them.
How would she ever even spread rumors?
By talking to herself?
There would be rumors about her talking to herself if she did that.
Yeah, but who else would she be talking to?
You are right, that is so true!
Simpleton.
Oh yeah, she was talking to some girl.
Something about us not being friends.
And she does not like me or something.
And I think she is avoiding me.
What did you mean, sorry,” Sadako?
Why did not you just say you liked me?
I guess she does not really like you.
Then what, do you think she hates me?
Do you think she was taking advantage of me?
Who knows.
Or maybe she does not even care.
Or maybe something else.
Something?
Like what?
I do not know.
Why do not you just ask her?
I will cheer you up if she says she does not care.
Later.
No thanks!
What the hell, something else”?
It was really easy to understand.
She made this for me, after all.
Oh my god Sadako, you suck at drawing.
Who goes through so much trouble for me?
Chizu, can you come out right now?
How was the exam?
I only got the parts that Sadako helped me with.
Yeah?
Sadako has not even smiled since things turned awkward.
Sadako seemed so happy lately.
She laughed when we were studying for the exam.
She did.
That was surprising.
That girl...
She would gotten used to being avoided.
It was normal for her, was not it?
Is not that a bit sad?
She is so nice too.
That is why I could not just leave her.
I guess that is why.
You get used to the attitudes around you,
and it gets hard to know how people are feeling,
or even how you are feeling yourself.
I sort of know what that is like.
That is why when she laughed,
I was really happy.
Is that what you were thinking all this time?
Do not cry dammit, it is embarrassing.
I did not realize you were thinking the same thing.
Well, I thought I knew Sadako pretty well,
but I guess we were getting upset because we only thought we did.
Then again, there are things we do not know about each other too.
Yano-chin, there is something important that we have not talked to Sadako about.
Sadako does not know that we feel this way either, does she?
What she meant by sorry,”
or not friends,”
or the rest of what she was saying...
What do you think she would have said?
I did not think we would ever get involved with her at all.
Now we are thinking about her constantly.
Seriously.
How much does she need to frustrate us?
Look how much we think about her.
We must really love her.
We said we were not sure if we were friends,
but really, we are totally friends.
I mean, look at how much we think about her.
I cannot know how someone else is feeling unless I ask.
Other people will not know how I am feeling unless I tell them.
We want to know because we do not know.
I am glad I can think that way.
I am glad I can feel that way,
to have met people that make me think that way.
let me talk to you...”
But they will probably be studying for the exam during the break.
After school?
They will probably be studying then too.
Do you hear something from over there?
Stop it, please.
I am nervous, but I do not mind it.
You already have someone you can talk to.
I have someone I can talk to.
I have people that will listen to me.
Shit, I am really screwed for the exam today.
Me too.
Oh no.
I spent too much time here thinking.
Oh yeah, remember that rumor about Sadako?
About Yano and Yoshida backing her up?
The rumor.
Well, apparently
T-That is a mistake.
Yano-san and Yoshida-san are not backing me up.
That is a lie.
Yano-san and Yoshida-san are nice people.
Here we go again.
Nice people”?
What the hell is she talking about?
I think she wants to talk to us.
She is sorta glaring at us, is not she?
This is what I always look like.
Like I said, Yano-san and Yoshida
Shut up, dammit.
I know, Yoshida and Yano, right?
You do?
The criminal and the slut.
Mistakes to be fixed
Feelings unyielding
Next episode: Friends
